page.title: 17LIFE STYLE,POTT SHRIGLEY.
page.content: Pott Shrigley Cricket Club draws members within & beyond the area. Adlington Civic Society is concerned with maintenance & improvement of natural amenities, holding winter meetings & summer outings.Adlington W.I. has members from many different walks of life, monthly meetings, outings, choir, painting & walking groups form some of their activities. "The Cheshire Hunt" & "Windmill" are old inns serving food & drinks to customers & providing play areas for children so that they too can enjoy themselves. The "Country Cafe" attracts older people from outside the village serving lunches, teas & dinner The North East Cheshire Drag Hunt meets twice a year, starting from the "Cheshire Hunt" to follow a scent trail over the local land thus providing sport without bloodshed.
